statements.select: select a.*, c.dd_name as customer_status_desc,'' as unit_code,'' as unit_name ,isnull((select IsALD From TCustomerDataDeployMapping x where x.CustomerId = a.customer_id and x.IsDelete = '0'),0) IsALD ,isnull((select IsPad From TCustomerDataDeployMapping x where x.CustomerId = a.customer_id and x.IsDelete = '0'),0) IsPad ,isnull((select UnitId From TCustomerDataDeployMapping x where x.CustomerId = a.customer_id and x.IsDelete = '0'),'') UnitId ,'' as unit_code,'' as unit_name ,isnull(tc.Units,-1) Units ,CASE WHEN tc.Units = -1 THEN '不限制' WHEN tc.Units IS NULL THEN '不限制'ELSE CAST(tc.Units AS NVARCHAR(10)) end Units_zh from t_customer a inner join vw_dic c on c.dic_code='status' and cast(a.customer_status as char)=c.dd_code left join T_CustomerEx tc on a.customer_code=tc.customer_code
inner join CustomerModuleMapping cmm on cmm.CustomerID = a.customer_id and VocaVerMappingID = #value#
where a.customer_id=#value#
where a.customer_code=#value#
select customer_id From t_customer where customer_code=#value#
inner join T_MobileUser_Customer d on(a.customer_id = d.customer_id) where d.user_id=#value#

select count(a.customer_id) from t_customer a inner join TCustomerDataDeployMapping c on a.customer_id=c.customerid where 1=1 and c.isdelete=0
a.customer_code like '%'+#Code#+'%'
a.customer_name like '%'+#Name#+'%'
a.customer_contacter like '%'+#Contacter#+'%'
a.customer_status = #Status#
c.unitid = #unit_id#

select a.* from ( select rownum_=row_number() over(order by a.customer_code), a.*, b.dd_name as customer_status_desc ,isnull(c.IsALD,0) IsALD ,isnull(c.IsPad,0) IsPad ,isnull(c.UnitId,'') UnitId ,isnull((select unit_code From T_unit y where c.unitid = y.unit_id ),'') unit_code ,isnull((select unit_name From T_unit y where c.unitid = y.unit_id ),'') unit_name ,tc.Units ,CASE WHEN tc.Units = -1 THEN '不限制' WHEN tc.Units IS NULL THEN '不限制'ELSE CAST(tc.Units AS NVARCHAR(10)) end Units_zh from t_customer a INNER JOIN vw_dic b ON b.dic_code = 'status' AND CAST(a.customer_status AS CHAR) = b.dd_code INNER JOIN TCustomerDataDeployMapping c ON a.customer_id = c.customerid AND c.isdelete = 0 LEFT JOIN T_CustomerEx tc ON a.customer_id = tc.CustomerId where 1=1
a.customer_code like '%'+#Code#+'%'
a.customer_name like '%'+#Name#+'%'
a.customer_contacter like '%'+#Contacter#+'%'
a.customer_status = #Status#
c.unitid = #unit_id#
) a where rownum_ > #StartRow# and rownum_<=#EndRow#

select a.*, b.dd_name as customer_status_desc,'' as unit_code,'' as unit_name ,isnull((select IsALD From TCustomerDataDeployMapping x where x.CustomerId = a.customer_id and x.IsDelete = '0'),0) IsALD ,isnull((select IsPad From TCustomerDataDeployMapping x where x.CustomerId = a.customer_id and x.IsDelete = '0'),0) IsPad ,isnull((select UnitId From TCustomerDataDeployMapping x where x.CustomerId = a.customer_id and x.IsDelete = '0'),'') UnitId ,'' as unit_name,'' as unit_code from t_customer a, vw_dic b where b.dic_code='status' and cast(a.customer_status as char)=b.dd_code
a.customer_status=#Status#
order by a.customer_code

select count(*) from t_customer where customer_code=#CustomerCode#
customer_id <> #CustomerID#
statements.update: update t_customer set customer_code=#Code#, customer_name=#Name#, customer_address=#Address#, customer_post_code=#PostCode#, customer_contacter=#Contacter#, customer_tel=#Tel#, customer_fax=#Fax#, customer_email=#Email#, customer_cell=#Cell#, customer_memo=#Memo#, customer_name_en=#EnglishName#, customer_start_date=#StartDate#, modify_user_id=#LastEditor.ID#, modify_user_name=#LastEditor.Name#, modify_time=getdate() where customer_id=#ID#
update t_customer set customer_status=1, modify_user_id=#LastEditor.ID#, modify_user_name=#LastEditor.Name#, modify_time=getdate() where customer_id=#ID#
update t_customer set customer_status=-1, modify_user_id=#LastEditor.ID#, modify_user_name=#LastEditor.Name#, modify_time=getdate() where customer_id=#ID#
statements.select: select case when a.max_user_count>a.user_count then 1 else 0 end from ( select a.customer_id,a.max_user_count,count(b.customer_id) as user_count from t_customer_connect a, t_customer_user b where a.customer_id=b.customer_id and a.customer_id=#value# group by a.customer_id,a.max_user_count ) a

select case when a.max_shop_count>a.shop_count then 1 else 0 end from ( select a.customer_id,a.max_shop_count,count(b.customer_id) as shop_count from t_customer_connect a, t_customer_shop b where a.customer_id=b.customer_id and a.customer_id=#value# group by a.customer_id,a.max_shop_count ) a

select case when a.max_terminal_count>a.terminal_count then 1 else 0 end from ( select a.customer_id,a.max_terminal_count,count(b.customer_id) as terminal_count from t_customer_connect a, t_customer_terminal b where a.customer_id=b.customer_id and a.customer_id=#value# group by a.customer_id,a.max_terminal_count ) a
statements.update: update t_customer set customer_status = #Status#, modify_user_id = #UserID#, modify_user_name = #UserName#, modify_time=getdate() where customer_id=#ID#
statements.select:
select count(*) from t_brand_customer where brand_customer_code=#brand_customer_code#
brand_customer_id <> #brand_customer_id#
select count(*) from t_brand_customer where brand_customer_id=#brand_customer_id#

select a.* ,a1.row_no ,@iCount icount ,b.user_name create_user_name ,c.user_name modify_user_name From t_brand_customer a inner join @TmpTable a1 on(a.brand_customer_id = a1.brand_customer_id) left join t_user b on a.create_user_id=b.user_id left join t_user c on a.modify_user_id=c.user_id where 1=1 and a1.row_no > #StartRow# and a1.row_no <= #EndRow#;

select a.* ,1 row_no ,1 icount ,b.user_name create_user_name ,c.user_name modify_user_name from t_brand_customer a left join t_user b on a.create_user_id=b.user_id left join t_user c on a.modify_user_id=c.user_id where a.brand_customer_id=#value#
statements.update: update t_brand_customer set brand_customer_code=#brand_customer_code# ,brand_customer_name=#brand_customer_name# ,brand_customer_eng=#brand_customer_eng# ,brand_customer_address=#brand_customer_address# ,brand_customer_post=#brand_customer_post# ,brand_customer_contacter=#brand_customer_contacter# ,brand_customer_tel=#brand_customer_tel# ,brand_customer_email=#brand_customer_email# ,status=#status# ,modify_user_id=#modify_user_id# ,modify_time=#modify_time# where brand_customer_id=#brand_customer_id#
statements.select:
select count(*) from t_customer a inner join T_MobileUser_Customer b on a.customer_id=b.customer_id where 1=1 and isnull(b.if_flag,'0') = '0'
b.User_Id = #User_Id#

update.isNotEmpty:
update T_MobileUser_Customer set bat_id = #BatId# ,Modify_Time = #ModifyTime# ,Modify_User_Id = #ModifyUserId# where 1=1 and user_id=#ModifyUserId# and customer_id in (
SELECT #CustomerList[].ID# );

statements.update: update T_MobileUser_Customer set if_flag = '1' ,Modify_Time = #ModifyTime# ,Modify_User_Id = #ModifyUserId# where bat_id = #BatId#;
statements.select:
select a.* from ( select rownum_=row_number() over(order by a.DataDeployName), a.*, CustomerCount=(select count(*) from TCustomerDataDeployMapping where DataDeployId=a.DataDeployId and IsDelete='0') ,'0' IsALD ,'0' IsPad from TDataDeploy a where 1=1
a.DataDeployId=#DataDeployId#
a.IsDelete=#IsDelete#
) a where rownum_ > #StartRow# and rownum_<=#EndRow#

select count(a.DataDeployId) from TDataDeploy a where 1=1
a.DataDeployId=#DataDeployId#
a.IsDelete=#IsDelete#

select a.* ,CustomerCount=(select count(*) from TCustomerDataDeployMapping where DataDeployId=a.DataDeployId and IsDelete='0') from TDataDeploy a where 1=1
a.DataDeployId=#DataDeployId#
a.IsDelete=#IsDelete#
order by a.DataDeployName
select a.DataDeployId from TCustomerDataDeployMapping a where 1=1 and isDelete='0' and a.CustomerId=#value#
statements.update: update TCustomerDataDeployMapping set IsDelete = '1' ,LastUpdateTime = #LastUpdateTime# ,LastUpdateBy = #LastUpdateBy# where CustomerId = #CustomerId# and isDelete='0';
